definitions.title: vb. denom.
definitions.body: break the neck of an animal;—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 2 ms. sf. [[וַעֲרַפְתּוֹ]] consec. Ex 13:13, Ex 34:20 (JE), 3 pl. [[וְעָֽרְפוּ־שָׁם אֶת־הָעֶגְלָה]] consec. De 21:4; Pt. act. [[עוֹרֵף כֶּלֶב]] Is 66:3; pass. [[הָעֶגְלָה]] [[הָעֲרוּפָה]] De 21:6; Impf. 3 ms. [[יַעֲרׂף]] Ho 10:2 fig. of breaking down altars.
